summary: This document is an email from ARCcorp.com to tipsearch@ARCcorp.com containing a Travel Intelligence Program (TIP) Search Report in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena from the US District Court for the Southern District of New York. The email includes attachments with search results and emphasizes confidentiality, noting ARC should not be identified as the information source.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued for Travel Intelligence Program Search
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena from the US District Court for the Southern District of New York was issued, resulting in a Travel Intelligence Program (TIP) Search Request and report.

locations: US District Court Southern District of New York, NYC
keyFacts: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued by the US District Court for the Southern District of New York on January 30, 2020.
ARCcorp conducted a Travel Intelligence Program (TIP) search in response to the subpoena and provided a confidential report.
The email stresses that ARC should not be identified as the original source of the information.
Attachments include a search report and other documents related to the subpoena and travel intelligence.
The email has a 60-day retention policy on ARC's secure email server unless saved by the recipient.
